name: Skorokhod representation theorem
source: Skorokhod, A.V. (1956); see also Billingsley, P. (1999). Convergence of Probability Measures, Theorem 6.7. If mu_n -> mu weakly on a Polish space S, there exist random variables X_n ~ mu_n and X ~ mu on a common probability space such that X_n -> X a.s.
